page.title: 11CLOTHES IN NORTH YATE
page.content: The clothes that people wear for work depends on the type of work they do. Many people in the area do manual work where jeans,jumpers and other casual clothes are worn.Men who work in offices,or as salesmen,wear smart suits.A lot of people wear casual clothes for leisure too : jeans, sweatshirts,t-shirts. For special occasions, men almost all wear a suit, and women wear a suit or a dress.Most people spend about Â£150_Â£250 in a year on clothes. When people have finished with their clothes they usually give them to a local jumble sale.A few people put them in a "rag-bag" and a few simply put them in the bin. It is common for people to make a special trip to Bristol's department stores to buy clothes. However, not many people regard it as important to keep up with the latest fashions.
